title: The Works of Robert Louis Stevenson - Swanston Edition, Vol. 23
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: In January 1853 Stevenson's parents moved to Inverleith Terrace, and inMay 1857 to 17 Heriot Row, which continued to be their Edinburgh homeuntil the death of Thomas Stevenson in 1887. Much of the boy's time wasalso spent in the manse of Colinton on the Water of Leith, the home ofhis maternal grandfather.
